title: synching my profile level with boards (ignore)
body: a bit weird that I need to do this lol

replies.body: Y'know, you could always use the stickied post [**Boards Syncing Tool**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/fos1aFEB-boards-profile-syncing-tool) up top, but this works too xP!
